Â Â Â Â Â Â  2014 (feb to dec)
Â Â Â Â Â Â  2015 (jan+feb)
Â Â Â Â Â Â  2015 (march-july)
Â Â Â Â Â Â  late 2015 (july-jan)
Â Â Â Â Â Â  early 2016 (feb-june)
Â Â Â Â Â Â  june 2016 through may 2017
Â Â Â Â Â Â  june 2017 only
Â Â Â Â Â Â  july 2017 - april 2019
Â Â Â Â Â Â  late 2018 (sep-dec) (hear me out. this is a smaller sub-section contained in the middle the previously mentioned section)
Â Â Â Â Â Â  may 2019 thru august 2020
Â Â Â Â Â Â  august 2020 thru feb 2022
Â Â Â Â Â Â  feb 2022 thru the future

8.23.22  6:43 pm   are you prepared for the inevitable rush of people asking if your quitting because of the song title?

8.23.22  6:17 pm   what does the text say at the beginning of the ending video 

Â Â Â Â Â  it says "getting ready to start my day. the weather makes me smile, it's a beautiful day when it rains all day. yes i'd like to get an education, and go into the high life and then climb back down, but i don't know how... to climb back out. i'm not worthy of the chosen road before me, and i don't even know who i wanna be. i'm not listening to the words we wrote on paper cause i'm not sure if anything is true. it's not true, it's not true. THAT'S NOT TRUE. but it still sounds musical. put it in my musical. and the musical music is true. and i'm not really sure how to handle it. don't really know what it is. don't really believe it. can't figure out what it says. it makes me weep, skip, sing it while i sleep, conversate with a stranger at 10x speed, and slow it way way down for the memory. slow it way way way down for the ending. [riff] that's the trumpet. get up and go stare at the flag pole. [riff] i'm not worthy of this course of entertainment and i don't even know who i'd rather be. i'm not listening to the words on the soundtrack cause i keep on getting more confused. and i'm not sure if anything is true. that's not true"

8.23.22  5:36 pm   how did you make the sick bass tone at the beginning of "im scared"? 

Â Â Â Â Â  probably the most important point about that is to have a piano also play the riff. also it should be a piano with absolutely zero release time on the note, so the note cuts off completely and immediately when you release it

8.23.22  5:36 pm   how many times per second do you change

Â Â Â Â Â  1 and 0 times. to be clear, that's 2 different numbers of times

8.23.22  5:31 pm   what do you think about this nice planet called neptune

Â Â Â Â Â  firstly, your opinion of the planet is that it is nice. just want to get that out of the way so your opinion doesn't influence my opinion by default. that being said, despite what little i know about neptune, my opinion happens to be about the same as yours

8.23.22  5:31 pm   Is "slow it way way down for the memory/slow it way way way down for the ending" in 11/4 time?

Â Â Â Â Â  if i were charting it, i'd probably write 5/4, 6/4, 5/4. If you make it 11/4, then it means the bar will look insanely long and also it would only be 1 actual bar of 11, because it breaks the pattern immediately after that

8.23.22  5:29 pm   is that red circle at the end of your latest music video a parody of clickbaity youtube thumbnails?

Â Â Â Â Â  yes

8.23.22  5:25 pm   i'm in college studying something that doesn't relate to music, most of my time is spent doing college stuff, but whenever i'm not doing college stuff i try my best to create music. is it possible to create beautiful music (like yours) even if i can't devote all of my time on it?  

Â Â Â Â Â  if you can't spend all your time on it, then it probably won't sound like mine. it might sound better. you might be able to escape the 'try-too-hard' vibe all together

8.23.22  4:53 pm   did you ever consider ending 'the ending' after the title line, after the 'slow it way way down for the ending', in kind of a moon-is-made-of-cheese-type fashion?

Â Â Â Â Â  i didn't know that was the title at the time, but, it was also immediately clear that it should go back to the verse right there. that verse melody riff is really the whole point of the song, and it was well overdue to make a repeat appearance

8.23.22  4:50 pm   Hi Bill, I'm going to start using this questions section as my personal journal for the next couple of days.

Â Â Â Â Â i understand

     Day 1:
Today went pretty well. Been packing up a bunch of my belongings because I'm about to leave and go on an adventure. Whether the adventure is going to be as good as the packing has been is yet to be determined. I also ate a bowl of spaghetti, but it was a bit too small so I added some more spaghetti to it in order to make it large enough and it was pretty good once I did that.

see you tomorrow for more updates

8.22.22  9:10 pm   writing a song is so much easier when i start with a verse, but it's so much easier for me to come up with a chorus than a verse to start with. what can be done to remedy this?

Â Â Â Â Â  start with something that doesn't care whether it's a verse or a chorus. or, you could possibly find a comfortable home in the timeless genre of AABA style songforms, where the A feels like a verse but also starts with the title. and the B feels more like a bridge and probably happens twice throughout the song
